body.name: Home Office Chair Mid Back PC Swivel Lumbar Support Adjustable Desk Task Computer Ergonomic Comfortable Mesh Chair with Armrest (Blue)
features: 🔥Easy To Assemble - We provide all the tools and the detailed instructions for you. No additional tools needed for assembly. It is easy to assemble this office chair by yourself at home.
🔥Swivel Casters - The chair can swivel 360 degrees. The casters are suitable for hard floors, carpet floors and more, swivel without noise and won't scratch the floor.

🔥Supportive Backrest - The open mesh design creates a breathable, well-ventilated backrest, yet with it’s resilient mesh, the back moulds to your back providing a more supportive seat, which helps align the spine and reduce pressure and muscle fatigue.

🔥Multifunction Mechanism - pneumatic controls make it easier to raise or lower the Seat. The rocking mode can relax you from heavy work, pull out the handle to start rocking and pull it in to stop. This chair can support up to 250lbs.
🔥Rest Assured to Purchase - We have a professional customer service team, so if you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact us. We are always with you.
body.description: FDW chairs, through its pursuit of excellence and continuous efforts, have added the element of "health" to the traditional "sitting culture" vigorously promoting "a healthy sitting culture" and hope that people can maintain the passion of life every day as well as creating vitality. SPECIFICATION: Color: Blue Material: Mesh Adjustable Seat height: 17.5”-20.5” Maximum Weight Capacity: 250 LBS Product Details: Ergonomic backrest with lumbar support breathable padded seat 360 degrees rotation & smooth-rolling casters Height adjustment handle What’s in the package? FDW office chair x1 Tools for assembly x1 User manual x1 Multi-USE CHAIR: Office Chair/ Desk Chair / Computer Chair / Task Chair / Ergonomic Chair / Swivel Chair Notes: We strongly recommend reading the user manual before assembly. Assemble tools are included

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 16, 2022
reviews.reviewText: My old chair collapsed two weeks before I ordered this chair. Go figure, it was a spare dining set chair that I used because I was too cheap to buy an actual office chair. On a hot Saturday morning, right after breakfast, I decided to go into my office, log onto my computer and email some people I don't particularly like.So I go in, plop down onto the cushion of my trusty old wooden kitchen table chair. However, as soon as my bagels make with the chair, I hear a (POP) and down I go. I didn't get hurt, because I'm kinda tubby and have enough cushion of my own to break the fall. But, now, I needed a chair--a REAL chair... AN OFFICE CHAIR!(Damn... Now I gotta spend money)So, there I was, looking around for the most economically-reasonable (okay, cheapest) chair to buy. I searched around several sites when I came across this one on Amazon. It took me two hours to decide to pry open my wallet and buy it. I'm livid because my wife wouldn't let me use another dining chair, I can't play Solitaire on either of my dual monitors, and I can't email my friends and tell them that they are no longer welcome at ANY of my cookouts because THEY eat more than ME. But moreover, I was PO'ed because I have to wait for my chair...But not too long...The chair actually came about four days later. I was coming home from work when I saw the box on my porch (*OH, JOY*). I jumped out my truck, scooped it up before any bad-assed neighborhood kids could steal it, took it straight back to my office and unpackaged it. I was actually kinda disappointed: the chair was a mass of plastic and cloth. It looked weak; I gave it about a week before I'd be on the floor again.It was easy to assemble, and once it was up, I figured--hell, it looks kinda nice. However, the true test would come with actual use (here come the buns).For the money I paid for it, this is a nice chair. It's comfortable and very sturdy. It rolls and swivels easily. Unlike my old kitchen chair, this one doesn't cut the circulation in my legs; I can sit at my computer and work, email anbd play games for hours without any pain,numbness or lower leg swelling.While this is a nice comfy chair, I gave it four stars for ergonomics because it's not very comfortable to sleep in. But other than that, I'm glad I bought it

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: This chair is exactly as pictured, it's easy to put together, and it's extremely comfortable. Great bang for your buck. I'm very pleased with it. I ordered the white with black trim.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 17, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Super comfy easy to assemble!!!!
reviews.reviewText: The media could not be loaded. This Home Office Chair with Mid Back PC Swivel Lumbar Support, adjustable height, and adjustable tension for the seat to lean back, offers Ergonomic Comfortable Mesh and Armrest. It is a fantastic addition to my home office. At first, I thought it would be difficult to assemble, but after opening the box and reading the directions, it was very simple. It took me about 10 minutes to put together; it's really straightforward. This chair offers remarkable comfort and functionality. Its ergonomic design provides excellent lumbar support, while the adjustable features allow for personalized comfort. The mesh material keeps me cool, and the swivel function allows for easy movement around my workspace. The chair feels sturdy and well-designed, and the sleek black color adds a professional touch. Overall, it's a top-notch chair that enhances both comfort and productivity in my home office. For the price, you seriously can't go wrong. It has a nice design, is easy to assemble, economical, and looks pretty cool. But most importantly, it's super comfortable. My only complaint is the smell; it has a weird odor to it which I hope goes away. I'm not really sure why it smells or what the smell is, but I'm leaving it outside for a day, hoping it goes away.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 3, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Chair showed up a day early. It was packaged good. Real easy to put together. Even nicer to sit in.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 18, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Expensive, but very fest shipping.
reviews.reviewText: This is a seller you want to do business with. The chair is fantastic, that's why I ordered this chair again. Easy to assemble by the instruction included. The second chair arrived with very small defect/damage which probably happened during shipping. Notify the seller and resolved the issue right away. 5 stars.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 11, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars It's a decent chair
reviews.reviewText: The chair was easy to assemble, felt good accomplishing that. The chair is comfortable and gives great back support. Unfortunately after a year of use (I am on my computer a lot), the chair would randomly change height positions, as if I would sink slowly and have to pull the lever and the chair height up again. Last night my chair would not lock in position and nearly hurt myself. I wondered why and took a look this morning and to my investigation, I found out why. This area is not very well made. I am not a heavy set person nor do I tilt back much. Great comfortability but not too sturdy or long lasting.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 13, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This chair is economical and nice. It was a little challenging to put together but overall a great item.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 13, 2021
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Good quality for an inexpensive chair.
reviews.reviewText: I needed a new chair for my computer desk at home because the chair I had (not an office chair, more of a small lounging chair) was killing my back. I didn't see the weight limit on this chair before I bought it. That's unfortunate because I weigh more than the stated limit, but I've had the chair for a couple of weeks now. It doesn't look like it's going to break. For the most part the chair is quite comfortable, and my back has stopped hurting. The chair is easy to put together and easy to adjust. It offers a decent amount of support. My only real complaint is that when sitting in a straight, upright position, the chair kind of leans forward and downward rather than flat. That's annoying at times but not too bad. Something I like about this chair is that the fabric doesn't seem to collect much dog hair.This chair is not durable enough for a professional setting, but I highly recommend it for those who want a supportive chair for a home office that doesn't take a lot of space. If you weigh significantly over 200 pounds this chair won't work quite as well for you, but it should still work ok if you can't find something better in your price range.
Great chair for the price easy to put together.

reviews.reviewTitle: 職場のミーティング用に2脚購入
reviews.reviewText: 組立直後の評価です。組立は、電動ドライバを使用したので、それ程大変ではなかったです。ガタつく感じはなく、座面のクッションもある程度厚みがあり、少なくとも、短時間での座り心地は悪くないです。キャスターの転がりは正直、決して良くはないように思いますが、キャスターでの移動するような使い方をしないので、私としては、問題ないです。価格は安いので、耐久性については、期待していないですが、価格に対して十分求める品質ではないかと思います。
お値段以上に座り心地も良くいいと思います

reviews.reviewTitle: 説明書が分かりにくかった
reviews.reviewText: 商品ページは「10分で組み立てができます」のように記載されていたのですが、説明書の最初のステップでは図示はあるものの文章がないため、「どこに、何を」取り付けるのか理解するのに、しばらく悩みました。狭い場所で組み立てたことと、組み立て手順を理解するのに時間がかかったため、組み立てが終わるまで1時間程かかりました。座り心地は、個人的にはまぁまぁです。
組み立て簡単で座りやすい買って正解
